thread.title: Holy Crap they actually fixed it!

post.author: parsonsbear
post.body:
http://www.wolfenstein.com/home/agegate?ref=news%2F2297

patch to fix the game-breaking save issue.

post.author: Phobos
post.body: And it looks like I will still be unable to play it. W tf

post.author: TelMarine
post.body: lol, I entered my birthdate as 01/01/1900, and it says i am INELIGIBLE to view the site, wow.

post.author: Kristus
post.body:
TelMarine wrote:
lol, I entered my birthdate as 01/01/1900, and it says i am INELIGIBLE to view the site, wow.

I always figured it'd happen if you overdid the age.

post.author: DoomUK
post.body:
So, someone who is actually approaching 110 years of age can't view the site because their age is supposedly ineligible and/or impossible.

Discrimination! Contact the discrimination security police immediately.

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
two months to fix that SHIT?
ok, screw them up

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: Nitpicking is the act of removing nits (the eggs of lice, generally head lice) from the host's hair. As the nits are cemented to individual hairs, they cannot be removed with lice combs and, before modern chemical methods were invented, the only options were to shave all the host's hair or to ...
